languages.text: "Крик бедного Антония... он кричит как в тот миг, когда невольно отдавал остатки своих сил. Мольбы Аннис, которую я обрек на бытие полумашиной. Я даже... почти чувствую касание Севиции, что пыталась спасти меня, но пала сама. Сколько голосов, что обвиняют меня по моим заслугам! Найди их... отыщи истинные голоса среди ложных!"

traits.locale_text: "Крик бедного Антония... он кричит как в тот миг, когда невольно отдавал остатки своих сил. Мольбы Аннис, которую я обрек на бытие полумашиной. Я даже... почти чувствую касание Севиции, что пыталась спасти меня, но пала сама. Сколько голосов, что обвиняют меня по моим заслугам! Найди их... отыщи истинные голоса среди ложных!"

languages.text: "I hear poor Antonius's scream... the scream he let out when he unwillingly gave up the last of his vitality. Annis's pleas — I condemned her to an existence as a half-machine. I can even... I almost sense Sevitia's touch. She tried to save me, but she fell instead. So many voices, all condemning me for what I did! Find them... Separate the true voices from the false echoes!"
languages.original_text: "Крик бедного Антония... он кричит как в тот миг, когда невольно отдавал остатки своих сил. Мольбы Аннис, которую я обрек на бытие полумашиной. Я даже... почти чувствую касание Севиции, что пыталась спасти меня, но пала сама. Сколько голосов, что обвиняют меня по моим заслугам! Найди их... отыщи истинные голоса среди ложных!"

traits.locale_text: "I hear poor Antonius's scream... the scream he let out when he gave up the last of his vitality against his will. Annis's pleas — I condemned her to an existence as a half-machine. I can even... I almost sense Sevitia's touch. She tried to save me, but instead she fell herself. So many voices, all accusing me for my actions! Find them... Separate the true voices from the false echoes!"

"I hear poor Antonius's scream... the scream he let out when he gave up the last of his vitality against his will. Annis's pleas — I condemned her to an existence as a half-machine. I can even... I almost sense Sevitia's touch. She tried to save me, but instead she fell herself. So many voices, all accusing me for my actions! Find them... Separate the true voices from the false echoes!"

I almost sense Sevitia's touch. She tried to save me, but she fell instead. So many voices, all condemning me for what I did! Find them... Separate the true voices from the false echoes!"

She tried to save me, but instead she fell herself. So many voices, all accusing me for my actions! Find them... Separate the true voices from the false echoes!"

I almost sense Sevitia's touch. She tried to save me, but she fell instead. So many voices, all condemning me for what I did! Find them... Separate the true voices from the false echoes!"

I almost sense Sevitia's touch. She tried to save me, but she fell instead. So many voices, all condemning me for what I did! Find them... Separate the true voices from the false echoes!"

"I hear poor Antonius's scream... the scream he let out when he unwillingly gave up the last of his vitality. Annis's pleas — I condemned her to an existence as a half-machine. I can even... I almost sense Sevitia's touch. She tried to save me, but she fell instead. So many voices, all condemning me for what I did! Find them... Separate the true voices from the false echoes!"

languages.text: «Escucho el grito del pobre Antonius... el gritó que soltó cuando le arrebataron sus últimas bocanadas de vida. Las súplicas de Annis... la condené a vivir como medio máquina. E incluso... casi puedo sentir el toque de Sevitia. Intentó salvarme, pero acabó cayendo. ¡Son muchas voces, y todas ellas me condenan por lo que hice! Encuéntrelas... ¡Separe las voces verdaderas de los falsos ecos!».
languages.original_text: "I hear poor Antonius's scream... the scream he let out when he unwillingly gave up the last of his vitality. Annis's pleas — I condemned her to an existence as a half-machine. I can even... I almost sense Sevitia's touch. She tried to save me, but she fell instead. So many voices, all condemning me for what I did! Find them... Separate the true voices from the false echoes!"

traits.locale_text: «Escucho el grito del pobre Antonius... el gritó que soltó cuando le arrebataron sus últimas bocanadas de vida. Las súplicas de Annis... la condené a vivir como medio máquina. E incluso... casi puedo sentir el toque de Sevitia. Intentó salvarme, pero acabó cayendo. ¡Son muchas voces, y todas ellas me condenan por lo que hice! Encuéntrelas... ¡Separe las voces verdaderas de los falsos ecos!».

languages.text: 「可哀想なアントニウスの悲鳴が聞こえます…彼が無念にも最後の命を使い切ったとき発した悲鳴です。次はアニスの懇願が…私は彼女に機械人間になれと宣告しました。そのうえ…セビティアに触れられた感覚さえ残っている。彼女は私を救おうとして代わりに倒れてしまいました。たくさんの声が私の行いを責め立てています！見つけなければ…偽りの声から真の声を探し出すのです！」
languages.original_text: "I hear poor Antonius's scream... the scream he let out when he unwillingly gave up the last of his vitality. Annis's pleas — I condemned her to an existence as a half-machine. I can even... I almost sense Sevitia's touch. She tried to save me, but she fell instead. So many voices, all condemning me for what I did! Find them... Separate the true voices from the false echoes!"

traits.locale_text: 「可哀想なアントニウスの悲鳴が聞こえます…彼が無念にも最後の命を使い切ったとき発した悲鳴です。次はアニスの懇願が…私は彼女に機械人間になれと宣告しました。そのうえ…セビティアに触れられた感覚さえ残っている。彼女は私を救おうとして代わりに倒れてしまいました。たくさんの声が私の行いを責め立てています！見つけなければ…偽りの声から真の声を探し出すのです！」

languages.text: “我听到了可怜的安东尼发出的尖叫声……是他最后一丝生命被我夺走时发出的惨叫。我听到了安妮丝的恳求，是我下令惩处她，把她改造成机仆。我甚至……我甚至几乎能感觉到塞维蒂娅的触碰。她打算救我一命，可她自己却命丧当场。那么多声音，都在谴责我的所作所为！找到他们……从虚假的回声之中找到真实的声音。”
languages.original_text: "I hear poor Antonius's scream... the scream he let out when he unwillingly gave up the last of his vitality. Annis's pleas — I condemned her to an existence as a half-machine. I can even... I almost sense Sevitia's touch. She tried to save me, but she fell instead. So many voices, all condemning me for what I did! Find them... Separate the true voices from the false echoes!"

traits.locale_text: “我听到了可怜的安东尼发出的尖叫声……是他最后一丝生命被我夺走时发出的惨叫。我听到了安妮丝的恳求，是我下令惩处她，把她改造成机仆。我甚至……我甚至几乎能感觉到塞维蒂娅的触碰。她打算救我一命，可她自己却命丧当场。那么多声音，都在谴责我的所作所为！找到他们……从虚假的回声之中找到真实的声音。”

languages.text: "Ich höre den armen Antonius schreien ... den Schrei, den er ausstieß als er gegen seinen Willen sein Leben aushauchte. Annis' Verteidigungsreden ... ich verdammte sie zu einer Existenz als Halbmaschine. Ich kann sogar ... Ich fühle beinahe Sevitias Berührung. Sie wollte mich retten, fiel aber stattdessen. So viele Stimmen, die mich allesamt für meine Taten verfluchen! Findet sie ... Trennt die wahren Stimmen von den falschen Echos."
languages.original_text: "I hear poor Antonius's scream... the scream he let out when he unwillingly gave up the last of his vitality. Annis's pleas — I condemned her to an existence as a half-machine. I can even... I almost sense Sevitia's touch. She tried to save me, but she fell instead. So many voices, all condemning me for what I did! Find them... Separate the true voices from the false echoes!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich höre den armen Antonius schreien ... den Schrei, den er ausstieß als er gegen seinen Willen sein Leben aushauchte. Annis' Verteidigungsreden ... ich verdammte sie zu einer Existenz als Halbmaschine. Ich kann sogar ... Ich fühle beinahe Sevitias Berührung. Sie wollte mich retten, fiel aber stattdessen. So viele Stimmen, die mich allesamt für meine Taten verfluchen! Findet sie ... Trennt die wahren Stimmen von den falschen Echos."

languages.text: « J'entends le cri de ce pauvre Antonius... le hurlement qu'il a poussé lorsque ses dernières forces l'ont quitté à son corps défendant. Les suppliques d'Annis, que j'ai condamnée à une existence de semi-machine. Pour un peu... je sentirais presque le contact de Sevitia. Elle qui a tenté de me sauver, et qui l'a payé de sa vie. Autant de voix qui me maudissent pour ce que j'ai fait ! Trouvez-les... Séparez les voix authentiques des échos mensongers ! »
languages.original_text: "I hear poor Antonius's scream... the scream he let out when he unwillingly gave up the last of his vitality. Annis's pleas — I condemned her to an existence as a half-machine. I can even... I almost sense Sevitia's touch. She tried to save me, but she fell instead. So many voices, all condemning me for what I did! Find them... Separate the true voices from the false echoes!"

traits.locale_text: « J'entends le cri de ce pauvre Antonius... le hurlement qu'il a poussé lorsque ses dernières forces l'ont quitté à son corps défendant. Les suppliques d'Annis, que j'ai condamnée à une existence de semi-machine. Pour un peu... je sentirais presque le contact de Sevitia. Elle qui a tenté de me sauver, et qui l'a payé de sa vie. Autant de voix qui me maudissent pour ce que j'ai fait ! Trouvez-les... Séparez les voix authentiques des échos mensongers ! »

languages.text: "Zavallı Antonius'un çığlığını duyuyorum. Gönülsüzce canından geçtiği anda attığı o çığlık... Annis'in yalvarışları... Onu yarı makine olarak yaşamaya mahkûm ettim. Ben... Sevitia'nın dokunuşunu neredeyse hissedebiliyorum. Beni kurtarmaya çalıştı ama benim yerime can verdi. Çok fazla ses var, hepsi de yaptıklarımdan dolayı beni suçluyor! Bulun onları... Hakiki sesleri sahte yankılardan ayırın!"
languages.original_text: "I hear poor Antonius's scream... the scream he let out when he unwillingly gave up the last of his vitality. Annis's pleas — I condemned her to an existence as a half-machine. I can even... I almost sense Sevitia's touch. She tried to save me, but she fell instead. So many voices, all condemning me for what I did! Find them... Separate the true voices from the false echoes!"
